c-programming.title: C Programming
c-programming.description: Learn the fundamentals of C programming language

videos.title: Introduction to C Programming
videos.description: Learn the basics of C programming language, including syntax, data types, and your first program.

videos.title: Variables and Data Types
videos.description: Understand variables, data types, and memory allocation in C.

videos.title: Control Structures - If Statements
videos.description: Learn about conditional statements and how to control program flow.

videos.title: Loops in C
videos.description: Master for loops, while loops, and do-while loops for iterative operations.

videos.title: Functions in C
videos.description: Learn how to define and use functions to organize your code.

videos.title: Arrays and Strings
videos.description: Understand how to work with collections of data using arrays and strings.

videos.title: Pointers in C
videos.description: Get to know one of C's most powerful features: pointers and memory management.

videos.title: Structures and Unions
videos.description: Learn how to create custom data types using structures and unions.

videos.title: File Handling in C
videos.description: Understand how to read from and write to files in C.

videos.title: Dynamic Memory Allocation
videos.description: Master malloc(), calloc(), realloc(), and free() functions for dynamic memory.

overallQuiz.title: C Programming Comprehensive Assessment
overallQuiz.description: Test your knowledge of all C programming concepts covered in this course.

python-basics.title: Python Basics
python-basics.description: Start your programming journey with Python

videos.title: Introduction to Python
videos.description: Learn what Python is and why it's one of the most popular programming languages.

videos.title: Installing Python and First Steps
videos.description: Set up your development environment and write your first Python program.

videos.title: Variables and Data Types
videos.description: Learn about strings, numbers, lists, and other Python data types.

videos.title: Control Flow with If-Else
videos.description: Make decisions in your code with conditional statements.

videos.title: Loops in Python
videos.description: Use for and while loops to iterate through data and repeat actions.

videos.title: Functions and Parameters
videos.description: Create reusable blocks of code with Python functions.

videos.title: Lists and Dictionaries
videos.description: Work with complex data structures to organize your information.

videos.title: Working with Files
videos.description: Read from and write to files using Python.

videos.title: Exception Handling
videos.description: Understand how to handle errors gracefully in your programs.

overallQuiz.title: Python Fundamentals Assessment
overallQuiz.description: Comprehensive test covering all Python basics from this course.

videos.title: Introduction to C++
videos.description: Learn the fundamentals of C++ and how it differs from C.

videos.title: Basic Syntax and Variables
videos.description: Understand C++ syntax, data types, and variable declarations.

videos.title: Functions and Overloading
videos.description: Learn how to create functions and use function overloading in C++.

videos.title: Classes and Objects
videos.description: Master object-oriented programming concepts with classes and objects.

videos.title: Constructors and Destructors
videos.description: Understand how to initialize and clean up objects in C++.

videos.title: Inheritance and Polymorphism
videos.description: Learn about inheritance hierarchies and polymorphic behavior in C++.

videos.title: Templates and Generic Programming
videos.description: Discover how to write flexible, reusable code with templates.

videos.title: Standard Template Library (STL)
videos.description: Master the powerful collection of containers and algorithms in the STL.

videos.title: Exception Handling
videos.description: Learn how to handle errors and exceptions in C++ programs.

videos.title: Modern C++ Features
videos.description: Explore the new features in modern C++ standards (C++11, C++14, C++17).

overallQuiz.title: C++ Programming Mastery Assessment
overallQuiz.description: Comprehensive test covering all C++ programming concepts from basics to advanced topics.

videos.title: Introduction to Java
videos.description: Learn about Java, its history, and why it's used for cross-platform development.

videos.title: Setting Up Java Development Environment
videos.description: Install JDK, set up your IDE, and write your first Java program.

videos.title: Java Syntax and Variables
videos.description: Master Java syntax, data types, and variable declarations.

videos.title: Control Flow in Java
videos.description: Learn about conditional statements and loops in Java.

videos.title: Classes and Objects
videos.description: Understand object-oriented programming concepts in Java.

videos.title: Inheritance and Interfaces
videos.description: Learn how to extend classes and implement interfaces in Java.

videos.title: Exception Handling
videos.description: Master try-catch blocks and exception hierarchies in Java.

videos.title: Collections Framework
videos.description: Explore Lists, Sets, Maps, and other collection classes in Java.

videos.title: Java I/O and File Handling
videos.description: Learn how to read and write files in Java.

videos.title: Introduction to GUI with Swing
videos.description: Create simple graphical user interfaces using Java Swing.

overallQuiz.title: Java Programming Comprehensive Assessment
overallQuiz.description: Test your knowledge of Java programming concepts from fundamentals to GUI development.

web-dev.title: Web Development
web-dev.description: Build responsive websites with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

videos.title: Introduction to Web Development
videos.description: Understand the fundamentals of how websites work and web development basics.

videos.title: HTML Fundamentals
videos.description: Learn HTML tags, elements, and document structure.

videos.title: CSS Basics
videos.description: Style your HTML with CSS selectors, properties, and values.

videos.title: CSS Layout and Flexbox
videos.description: Master modern CSS layout techniques with Flexbox.

videos.title: CSS Grid
videos.description: Create complex layouts with CSS Grid layout system.

videos.title: Responsive Web Design
videos.description: Make your websites adapt to different screen sizes with media queries.

videos.title: JavaScript Basics
videos.description: Learn JavaScript syntax, variables, and control flow.

videos.title: DOM Manipulation
videos.description: Interact with HTML elements using JavaScript and the DOM API.

videos.title: Events and Event Handling
videos.description: Respond to user interactions with JavaScript event handlers.

videos.title: Building a Complete Project
videos.description: Put everything together by building a complete responsive website.

overallQuiz.title: Web Development Assessment
overallQuiz.description: Test your knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for modern web development.

react.title: React.js
react.description: Build modern user interfaces with React

videos.title: Introduction to React
videos.description: Learn what React is and why it's popular for building modern web applications.

videos.title: Setting Up React Environment
videos.description: Install Node.js, npm, and create your first React application.

videos.title: JSX and React Components
videos.description: Understand JSX syntax and how to create React components.

videos.title: Props and State
videos.description: Learn about component props and state management in React.

videos.title: React Hooks - useState
videos.description: Master the useState hook for state management in functional components.

videos.title: React Hooks - useEffect
videos.description: Handle side effects in your components with the useEffect hook.

videos.title: React Router
videos.description: Implement client-side routing in your React applications.

videos.title: Forms and Controlled Components
videos.description: Handle form inputs and validation in React applications.

videos.title: Context API
videos.description: Share state across components without prop drilling using Context API.

videos.title: Building a Complete React Application
videos.description: Put everything together by building a complete React application.

overallQuiz.title: React.js Comprehensive Assessment
overallQuiz.description: Test your knowledge of React components, hooks, routing, and state management.
